WorkItem.Description:
Been playing around with ConfirmButtonExtender with Submitterbutton with RSVP in Events (View).
 
I also would like to see a Mgbox with some text (idealy referring to the Event) and OK button only confirming the user that he has just submitted his attendance.
 
I have been looking at Javascript Alert but can't find any examples in Threads or the Web that invoke a Msgbox in this way (always via a Button Attribute, but since this is to be invoked in another way i have no clue) Anybody?

Comments.Message: ConfirmButtonExtender is the best way to accomplish this.
